wikipedia_page.main: Mark Moore (born 28 September 1961) is a British cross-country skier. He competed in the men's 15 kilometre event at the 1984 Winter Olympics.

link_mentions.page: Great Britain at the 1984 Winter Olympics

response: Mark Moore (born 1965) is a British record producer and nightclub owner.
Mark Moore may also refer to:
* Mark Moore (educator) (born 1961), British educator headmaster and Head of College of Clifton College
* Mark Moore (ice hockey) (born 1977), Canadian retired ice hockey defenseman
* Mark Moore, owner of Team Moore Racing
